comments:
Plugin B depends on Plugin A. I refactor-renamed A (from
com.xyx.helloworld.application to com.xyz.helloworld.application). I also had to
rename the package.
Plugin B showed an error on the dependencies page of the manifest editor, which
I think was active at the time. I deleted the xyx plugin from the list, and
tried to add the xyz one. Saw the following in the error log:
